power.title: Cloud of Flies
power.fluff: You breathe out a cloud of acidic black flies that streak across the battlefield, swarming your foe and attempting to enter its body

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude
If the target is bloodied, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack rolls

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier acid damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target grants combat advantage for the first attack made against it before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Delban's Deadly Attention
power.fluff: A bolt of frigid starlight shines down and bathes your foe, causing the creature to suffer a spasm of agony just as it attacks you

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy in hits you with a melee attack

section.name: Target:
section.target: the triggering enemy in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes necrotic damage equal to 2 + your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. If the target is cursed by you, you can add your curse damage.

section.name: Star Pact:
section.text: You add your Intelligence modifier to the necrotic damage.
The target chooses either to deal half damage with the triggering attack, or to increase the necrotic damage by 1d8.

power.title: Eldritch Claws
power.fluff: At your command, clawed hands crafted from eldritch energies wrap around your foe

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have the Eldritch Pact class feature.

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Charisma modifier damage, and the primary target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
The attack's damage type and keyword changes depending on your Eldritch Pact:

section.name: Dark Pact, Sorcerer-King Pact:
section.text: Necrotic damage, and the Necrotic keyword.

section.name: Elemental Pact, Fey Pact, Vestige Pact:
section.text: Psychic damage, and the Psychic keyword.

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: Fire damage, and the Fire keyword.

section.name: Star Pact:
section.text: Radiant damage, and the Radiant keyword.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your current turn, you can use the Eldritch Rake attack. If this attack was a critical hit, you can use it until the end of your next turn instead.
If this attack was a hit, you use the primary target as the origin square. If it was a miss, you use the space the target occupied when you made the attack.

section.name: Target:
section.target: one creature other than the primary target

section.text: You cannot target the same creature more than once per turn

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You deal damage depending on your Eldritch Pact.

section.name: Dark Pact:
section.text: Necrotic damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus, and the Necrotic keyword.

section.name: Elemental Pact:
section.text: Damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus of the type and keyword matching your elemental affinity.

section.name: Fey Pact:
section.text: Psychic damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus, and the Psychic keyword.

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: Fire damage equal to your Constitution modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus, and the Fire keyword.

section.name: Sorcerer-King Pact:
section.text: Necrotic damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus, and the Necrotic keyword.

section.name: Star Pact:
section.text: Radiant damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus, and the Radiant keyword.

section.name: Vestige Pact:
section.text: Psychic damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus, and the Psychic keyword.

power.title: Eldritch Rain
power.fluff: You fire purple rays of eldritch power at your foes

section.name: Attack:
section.target: one creature, or two creatures no more than 5 squares apart from each other
section.text: Charisma vs. Reflex

section.name: Fey Pact:
section.text: You can choose to target three creatures no more than 5 squares apart from each other

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Charisma modifier damage.

section.name: Elemental Pact:
section.text: You can choose to make this attack deal the type of damage matching your current elemental affinity and to gain the matching keyword.

section.name: Fey Pact:
section.text: If you target only one creature, the attack deals additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus damage if you only targeted one creature.

power.title: Fiery Bolt
power.fluff: You call up a bolt of golden flame and hurl it at your foe, with anyone standing close to him ending up burned as well

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier fire damage, and each creature adjacent to the target takes fire damage equal to your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: Adjacent creatures take additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus fire damage.

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: Additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Fortune Binding
power.fluff: You create ethereal black ropes that bind you to your enemy and as the ropes twist, your luck improves at the cost of your's enemy's

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.
You transfer one condition or effect of your choice from you to the target.

section.name: Vestige Pact:
section.text: If the condition you transferred allows saving throws, the target takes a -2 penalty on the first save it makes.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus psychic damage if you have a condition or effect on you that a save can end.

power.title: Frigid Darkness
power.fluff: You create a freezing black shadow around your foe, a small taste of the icy darkness in the depths of the night sky that causes the foe to not see well enough to defend itself

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier cold damage, and shadows cling to the target until the end of your next turn.
While the shadows cling to the target, it grants combat advantage and takes a -5 penalty to Perception.

section.name: Star Pact:
section.text: While the shadows cling to the target, it takes a penalty to AC and Reflex equal to one-half your Intelligence modifier.

section.name: Miss (Infernal Pact):
section.text: If the target is bloodied, it grants you combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Hands of Ihbar
power.fluff: Inky black, frigid tendrils emerge as if from your foes' bodies, curling and winding around their hosts to tightly that blood flow and movements are hampered

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d6 + Charisma modifier cold damage.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: The target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Star Pact:
section.text: If the target has resist cold, you reduce it by one-half your level (save ends).

section.name: Effect:
section.text: A target in the center square is slowed until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Lure of Loyalty
power.fluff: You lay a wreath of confusion over your enemy, drawing it closer and commanding its temporary loyalty

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: You pull the target 4 squares to a square adjacent to you. If the target was already adjacent to you, you can slide it 2 squares to a square adjacent to you instead.
The first time an enemy attacks you before the end of your next turn, the target must charge that enemy or make a basic attack against it as a free reaction.

section.name: Fey Pact:
section.text: You can slide the target 3 squares before it makes its attack.

section.name: Sorcerer-King Pact:
section.text: Instead of the target attacking, you can choose to use the following action instead:

section.name: Immediate Interrupt:
section.text: Trigger: An enemy attacks you, but not the target of this power; The target of this power becomes the target of the triggering attack.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target cannot make attacks against you until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Lure of Minauros
power.fluff: You whisper dark promises, sending them forth to pollute your enemy's mind with overwhelming terror and leaving them lingering around you

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.

The target makes a basic attack against the creature closest to it as a free reaction. If more than one creature is equally close, you choose which it attacks. You do not count as a creature for this.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You activate an Aura 1 (Arcane, Fear, Implement, Psychic) that lasts until the end of your next turn.

Each time you take damage, each enemy in the aura takes psychic damage equal to your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. A creature does not take this damage if it is the source of the damage.

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: Bloodied enemies in the aura take additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Otherwind Stride
power.fluff: You call up an unseen maelstorm of power that lashes nearby creatures - you then step into the vortex and emerge somewhere a short distance away

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You teleport up to 5 squares.

section.name: Fey Pact:
section.text: You can choose to teleport before making the attack instead of after.

power.title: Shared Agony
power.fluff: Sometimes pain is the price of victory - to wrack your opponent's mind, you have to give up a fragment of your own sanity

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Before resolving the attack, you take psychic damage equal to the target's level. This damage cannot be reduced or negated.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will
You have combat advantage on the attack

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d12 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You can take damage equal to one-half the target's level to reroll the attack.

section.name: Dark Pact:
section.text: If you reroll the attack, you deal additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier for each time you choose to reroll it.

power.title: Upsetting Onslaught
power.fluff: Your attack leaves your enemy reeling, unable to get its bearings without harming itself further

section.name: Infernal Pact:
section.text: You can choose to give this power the Fear and Psychic keywords. If you do, the damage becomes psychic damage.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Dark Pact:
section.text: You can choose to target Fortitude instead.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d4 + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the start of your next turn.
The target can choose to end the dazed condition as a free action on its turn. If it does, it takes damage equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Vile Calamity
power.fluff: With a single word, you submerge your enemy in a deluge of chaotic energy
power.keyword: Arcane, Cold, Fire, Implement, Lightning, Thunder

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Charisma modifier cold, fire, lightning and thunder damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each creature adjacent to the target and under your curse takes cold, fire, lightning and thunder damage equal to your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Void Blast
power.fluff: A mote of darkness appears before you, then explodes to envelop your foes in a field of shadow and madness

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.

section.name: Miss (Dark Pact):
section.text: Psychic damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The blast creates a zone of maddening shadows that lasts until the end of your next turn.
The zone is heavily obscured and blocks line of sight to creatures other than you or those that have darkvision. Creatures with darkvision treat the zone as obscured instead.

section.name: Star Pact:
section.text: Any creature other than you that ends its turn in the zone takes psychic damage equal to your Intelligence + your implement's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Worms
power.fluff: For a moment, your foe is covered in biting, swarming, and crushing maggots that make up the infinite extradimensional body of the Worm That Walks

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Charisma modifier acid damage, and you regain hit points equal to your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: You regain hit points equal to your Charisma modifier + twice your implement's enhancement bonus instead.

section.name: Star Pact:
section.text: Add your Intelligence modifier to the hit points regained, to a maximum equal to the damage dealt.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Acid damage equal to your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Your Delicious Weakness
power.fluff: The voices whisper of the cold between stars, between lives, and you smile - the spell that surges out against your enemy bites down to their deepest weakness

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If the target is vulnerable to any damage types or has another weakness towards a damage type, this power instead deals damage of that type and gains the corresponding keyword instead of Psychic. If the target has more than one vulnerability or weakness, you choose which damage type to deal.
This does not reveal to you what the vulnerabilities or weaknesses are, only the related damage types.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Charisma vs. Will (psychic damage), or
Charisma vs. Fortitude (cold, force, necrotic, poison or thunder damage), or
Charisma vs. Reflex (acid, fire, lightning or radiant damage)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage.

section.name: Dark Pact:
section.text: If this power deals damage of a type the target has a vulnerability or weakness to, you deal additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If this power deals damage of a type the target has a vulnerability or weakness to, it takes half damage.
